links.title: You Will NEVER Guess What Elon Musk Is Selling Now - Elon Musk Sells This???
links.description: If you don't know who Elon Musk is, you might have been living under a rock. The South African-born business magnate, investor, engineer, and inventor is richer than Donald Trump and more of a visionary than the Dalai Lama. Elon Musk, who brought us Tesla, The Boring Company, SpaceX, and more - now has a new venture.

message.body: $DJIA $SPY $SPX $NDX - I Highly recommend following Kimble Charts & his website - https://www.seeitmarket.com/bulls-wall-resistance-fibonacci-261-level-stock-market-17910/ - excellent work - always great lessons to be learned 👍

links.title: Bulls Run Into Wall Of Resistance At 261.8 Fibonacci Price Level
links.description: After hitting the 261.8 Fibonacci price level, the Dow Jones Industrials stock market index saw several win streaks end, market volatility pick up, and the quickest 10 percent decline in history from all-time highs. Will this become a "wall of resistance" for investors?

messages.body: $TSLA , So .. ref posts below (sell on rallies) ... who will be buying the dips now!!

$TSLA 7% more water in the air has caused weather related extreme events and persistent weather patterns.  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U2FxJelkAtI

links.title: Scientist Reveals 7% More Water Vapor Fuels Storms Today
links.description: Jennifer Francis, Ph.D., Research Professor I, Department of Marine and Coastal Sciences, Rutgers University, speaks about weather changes. And how are those related to climate change? In this presentation, Dr. Francis will explain new research that links increasing extreme weather events with the rapidly warming and melting Arctic during recent decades.

links.title: Electric vehicles incentive program
links.description: Accelerating the shift to low- and zero-emission vehicles will be crucial if Ontario is to achieve its climate change goal of reducing greenhouse gas emissions (GHG) to 15% below 1990 levels in 2020, 37% in 2030 and 80% in 2050.

messages.body: $TSLA Ever seen a Semi hauling a full load accelerate like that?! https://youtu.be/EtOzoqBjTaY

links.title: Tesla Semi acceleration video 2
links.description: My dashcam's point of view of the acceleration of the Tesla Semi. I attempted to follow the trucks, but lost them as they got on to I-80 westbound. My Tesla Adventure (the blue Model S) has a better perspective of this. He filmed the trucks taking off, and then followed them all the way onto the freeway.
